segments.text: How can that woman just stand there drying dishes while the sink floods?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, ruining the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely ignoring the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those sneaky kids stealing cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking his neck on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What kind of parenting is this, letting them climb like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is in on it too, begging for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, water pouring, it's all so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around already, you oblivious adult!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden view is wasted on this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fuming just seeing this negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to teach those kids about rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my blood boil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Fix the faucet before it's a total disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
